name: Shamet Game
description:
This is an indie release, with packed in features such as instant video chatting, real-time player interaction and a huge library of 'etc' and 'evt' videos and games.
It provides users with all the games of their choice, in one easy to use interface. Players can put their own custom keywords, add their own video-plays and share their own games. It's easy to share your own game, make suggestions with your friends or find out more about the game. The collection of 'Shamet Games' is 100% free and will be uploaded to the community without charge. The download starts with a web browser and gradually grows, providing you with access to the entire file in one screen view. You can upload and share your game anywhere, as long as you run an online service like HDNinja, Tilt, or Twitch.tv. It is also possible to directly download a game from the 'Shamet Game' website. Thanks to your participation and constructive feedback, this is the most innovative video game in the world.
